settings.question: What are the main ingredients in your products?
settings.answer: Our products contain a unique blend of amino acids, keratin, natural plant extracts, and essential vitamins that work together to strengthen and beautify your hair from root to tip.

settings.question: How often should I use the treatment?
settings.answer: For best results, we recommend using our treatment products 2-3 times per week. However, our daily care products like shampoo and conditioner can be used with every wash.

settings.question: Are your products safe for colored hair?
settings.answer: Yes! All our products are color-safe and actually help protect and extend the life of your hair color. They're free from sulfates and harsh chemicals that can strip color.

settings.question: Do you offer international shipping?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship worldwide. Shipping times and costs vary by location. Most international orders arrive within 7-14 business days. Check our shipping page for more details.

settings.question: What is your return policy?
settings.answer: We offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely happy with your purchase, contact us for a full refund or exchange. Products must be unused or minimally used.

settings.question: Are your products tested on animals?
settings.answer: No, we are proudly cruelty-free. We never test our products on animals and only use ethical, sustainable ingredients in all our formulations.
